objects.text:
• Premium wicker basket with elegant trim
• Spacious design for 4-6 person dining
• Includes water-resistant picnic blanket
• Multiple compartments for storage

product_details.name: Deluxe Picnic Basket Set - Complete Outdoor Dining Experience
product_details.description:
• Premium wicker picnic basket with elegant lace trim detail
• Spacious design perfect for 4-6 person outdoor dining
• Includes striped picnic blanket with water-resistant backing
• Multiple compartments for organized food and beverage storage
• Perfect for beach outings, park gatherings, and outdoor festivities
• Durable woven construction with comfortable carrying handle
• Complementary bread basket with rustic charm
• Ideal for storing fresh fruits, sandwiches, and picnic essentials
• Stylish aesthetic perfect for Instagram-worthy outdoor dining
• Portable and lightweight design for easy transportation

banner_details:
The banner features a clean, modern design with a diagonal two-tone background transitioning from olive green to a soft ivory, representing nature and relaxation. Overlayed are curved and star-like graphic elements and translucent abstract shapes for depth. The heading layer (`heading`) uses a bold, rounded typeface and is positioned prominently at the top left to highlight the product name. The tagline layer (`tagline`) sits just below the title in all caps, reinforcing the outdoor concept. A short bulleted list (`description`) outlines product features in an easy-to-read font. The price (`price`) is displayed large and bold below, grabbing attention. A bright orange rounded rectangle button (`cta_button`) with the "SHOP NOW" label (`cta`) encourages action. A stylish image of a diverse group enjoying a picnic (`product_image`) grounds the lower third, adding vibrancy and lifestyle appeal.

**Color Palette:**
- Olive Green: `#4A6F3B`, `#5B7C4A`
- Ivory/Cream: `#FAEFD2`, `#F5EBD8`
- Accent Orange: `#F5A623`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a vibrant outdoor picnic scene filled with warm and cheerful tones. The color palette for the advertisement banner should reflect a bright, friendly, and relaxed summer vibe. Dominant colors include the warm ochre of the orange shirt (#F5A623), rich denim blue from jeans and shirts (#3D6BA5), soft straw beige from hats and baskets (#E8D6B9), and fresh natural tones like peachy orange (#F4A460) and leafy green (#B4C79C). These colors blend seamlessly through clothing, food, and picnic elements, yet are highlighted subtly by strategic contrast against neutral whites (#FFFFFF) and wood browns (#8B5E3C).
